Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored 25 points, going 6/11 from three-point range
Trey Murphy scored 22 points in the first three quarters before exiting with a left ankle injury
Dejounte Murray recorded a triple-double with 14 points, 10 rebounds, and 12 assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Orleans Pelicans drained 18 three-pointers, their third time over the past week making exactly that many in a game
Others: The Pelicans built a double-digit first-half lead and were never seriously threatened by Washington after intermission
Dejounte Murray continues to improve his playmaking numbers, handing out a dozen dimes for a second straight game
Yves Missi had 16 points, 7 rebounds, and 3 blocks in his matchup against No. 2 overall pick Alex Sarr of Washington
